name: DISC ROOM
summary: DISC ROOM is a hardcore dodge-'em up brought to you by Kitty Calis, Jan Willem Nijman, and Doseone. A utopian future filled with lethal discs, requiring only reflexes and strategic use of slow-motion. As more rooms are unlocked, a way out might appear: "You don't have to die... you can live! Live 30 seconds and grow old!"
